item.title: OUR COMPANY
item.content: <p style=\"padding-bottom: 14px; text-align: justify;\">It has been working in the specific shoe sector since 1948, specializing during the years in the production of menâ€™s classic shoes. In the last few years, apart from the orthopedic shoes, it has developed a new line of shoes with height increase (+7 cm. + 10 cm.). This has been perfect for people, who want to be taller. Our shoes are made and produced only with Italian materials.</p>
